dublin_core.dcvalue: The what of Lifestyle Medicine including a whole foods dietary pattern has been well established but the how has remained elusive How do we apply what we know in a cost effective and widely accessible manner to prevent treat and even reverse chronic disease Over the decade ahead we believe the field of Lifestyle Medicine and the people who need it most will benefit from addressing the how This article summarizes the founding and operational principles of FareWell Inc a digital therapeutics company targeting lifestyle related cardiometabolic diseases We outline our current use of mobile health technology and artificial intelligence and describe our early clinical experience business model and key anticipated challenges
FareWell and the How of Lifestyle Medicine.
